block.p: SIMON-Hyman, of Glen Cove, New York, on May 24th, 2000, at age 78. Beloved husband of Ruth. Wonderful father of Michael, Andrew and Joseph. Grandfather of Daniel, Rachel, Samantha, Jacob, Derek, Joanna and Kyle. Brother of Paul. Retired partner of KPMG Peat Marwick. Funeral service at Gutterman's Funeral Home, 8000 Jericho Turnpike, Woodbury, NY, 1 PM, Thursday, May 25. In lieu of flowers, donations to Memorial Sloan-Kettering Cancer Center to further the research of Dr. Leslie Blumgart, or to Congregation Tifereth Israel, Glen Cove, NY.
